book.synopsis: In 1876, on the eve of the Centennial Exposition in Philadelphia, twenty-year-old Vesper Holly and her friends clash yet again with the archfiend Dr. Helvitius, whose evil schemes plunge them into danger. Reissue.
book.dimensions: Height: 8 Inches, Length: 5 Inches, Weight: 0.3 Pounds, Width: 0.5 Inches
